title: Game of Thrones RePack By R.G Revenants NASWARI+ZOHAIB
description:

Medicine: DWORD / SKIDROW Steam Emu

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
Operating system: Windows Ã‚Â® XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7

Video: 256 Mb, Shader Model 3.0

DESCRIPTION:
The game based on the epic saga of George Martin's A Song of Ice and Fire, known in Russia as the "Song of Ice and Fire", won the hearts of millions of fans around the world of Fantasy. Went to the world of the book sold more than 15 million copies, and the television series "Game of Thrones," based on the first volume of the saga, instantly won acclaim of audiences and critics.
"Game of Thrones" is perhaps the most ambitious project of Cyanide Studio: game created on the graphics engine Unreal Engine 3, and the script for it is written under the guidance of George Martin. Without a doubt, the adventure in one of the most detailed game universes will bring a lot of fun and the fans of the famous saga, fans and RPG, and connoisseurs of quality medieval fantasy.
